rows.title: Standard Template
rows.message_text: This is a standard template that demonstrates a variety of things that would need to be translated and a few things that are excluded from translation.

rows.title: Nested Template
rows.message_text: This is a nested template that demonstrates a variety of things that would need to be translated and a few things that are excluded from translation. This will allow us to check that the multi-lingual system works with nesting.

rows.title: Component to translate
rows.message_text: This is an example of a component that requires translation: the placeholder text and the selected option should be translated

rows.title: Component that should not be translated translate
rows.message_text: This is an example of a component that is excluded from translation. The button text should still be Pop-up 1.

rows.title: Step without translation
rows.message_text: This step in the tour should not be translated as the exclude_from_translation column is TRUE.
